text: Drinking water supply would remain suspended to the following places on January 18 and 19 owing to a burst in drinking water mains of the Vedaranyam Combined Drinking Water Supply Scheme: Tiruvarur, Thiruthuraipoondi and Vedaranyam municipalities, Muthupettai and Thalaignayiru town panchayats, Kumbakonam, Papanasam, Valangaiman, Needamangalam, Mannargudi, Kottur, Muthupettai, Thiruthuraipoondi and Vedaranyam panchayat unions. The respective local bodies have been requested to make alternative arrangements for supply on both days, according to a release from TWAD Board.
title: Water supply to be hit in Thanjavur
